name: MULTIPLAYER quiz show game
description:
Note: This game isn't completed yet. It is missing a second round and a final round.

Play a quiz show online with your friends! It loads questions from jservice.io so you should never run out of questions! Hit Host Online Game in the main menu to run an online game on port 7777, and have your friends join by typing in your IP in the Join Online Game menu. This game is meant to be played with voice chat.

As a contestant, select questions with WASD, hit Space to select questions and Space buzz in.

As the host, hit Space when you are finished reading questions and E to give the player points for the answer or Q to mark the player's answer incorrect.
